p: Beilschmiedia robusta C.K. Allen is a tree, 10–15 m tall that is recorded from Guangzi, southwestern Guizhou, Xizang, and Yunnan provinces in China [ 12, 18]. In Vietnam, the tree is found in Lào Cai, Ninh Bình, and Nghệ An provinces [ 14]. A perusal of the literature has revealed that there have been no previous phytochemical investigations of B. robusta.
